resources.string: Select keybox XML used for key attestation spoofing for all apps system wide. Click the delete button in order to reset the keybox data values used by the system.
Select PIF JSON used for prop attestation spoofing for google mobile services. Click the delete button in order to reset the PIF data props and use dynamic PIF props which are used by default.
Show in QS & Quick QS Panel
Show brightness slider in the bottom of QS panel
